about_the_game:
Gameplay

Dukkido is a physics-based, Co-Op Action RTS where you directly control your Captain and a squad of minions. Collect resources, uncover artifacts, solve puzzles, and build your army while unraveling the secrets of the Relic Frontier. Play solo or with up to 5 players in chaotic Online Co-Op, and complete over 5 unique objectives in Dukkido's fully handcrafted mission-based adventure.

Every mission features a familiar level, but with countless different layouts, puzzles, enemies, and secrets to uncover. You can choose to follow the mission objective and collect resources, or you can instead delve into one of Dukkido's hostile dungeons. Beware the looming crackdown timer, where the planet itself will grow increasingly hostile until you can safely extract with your army.

Dukkido is home to dozens of unique enemies, each featuring unique combat mechanics to test you and your dogs of war.

About the Project

Dukkido is being developed by MariSuCho, a small independent team of three developers on a shoestring budget. We're doing our best to turn Dukkido into something everyone can enjoy, without compromising what we believe makes games fun and enchanting. Dukkido is still in its early stages, and every little bit of support helps.

Currently, we're aiming for a full public demo around June 2025. If you want to follow the project, please check out our Discord for the most frequent updates, and to participate in our growing community! We are also currently interested in publishing opportunities.

Gameplay

Dukkido is a physics-based, Co-Op Action RTS where you directly control your Captain and a squad of minions. Collect resources, uncover artifacts, solve puzzles, and build your army while unraveling the secrets of the Relic Frontier. Play solo or with up to 5 players in chaotic Online Co-Op, and complete over 5 unique objectives in Dukkido's fully handcrafted mission-based adventure.

Every mission features a familiar level, but with countless different layouts, puzzles, enemies, and secrets to uncover. You can choose to follow the mission objective and collect resources, or you can instead delve into one of Dukkido's hostile dungeons. Beware the looming crackdown timer, where the planet itself will grow increasingly hostile until you can safely extract with your army.

Dukkido is home to dozens of unique enemies, each featuring unique combat mechanics to test you and your dogs of war.

About the Project

Dukkido is being developed by MariSuCho, a small independent team of three developers on a shoestring budget. We're doing our best to turn Dukkido into something everyone can enjoy, without compromising what we believe makes games fun and enchanting. Dukkido is still in its early stages, and every little bit of support helps.

name: Dukkido

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 1800X, Intel i7-7820X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or Equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Game is CPU Bottlenecked. Uses Vulkan.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 or Better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Recruit an army of minions and overwhelm the enemy! Dukkido is a physics-based Action-RTS, featuring large handcrafted levels and dungeons. You've been Zorped in from your edge of reality, and command your Dogs of War to riches, glory, and a good meal. Supports up to 5-player online co-op.
supported_languages:
English*, Danish, Dutch
*languages with full audio support
